item.description:
I plan to hold a table for the group. Would it be possible for everyone to update their RSVP to yes or no? I want to get a table large enough for our group - otherwise we may have to find separate ones, if available. Also, I do not want to hold too large a table, taking away business from the establishment. Thanks for your cooperation!


Earlier this year, a group of us met here for brunch and saw a great band. The musicians (Super Chief Trio) are returning for another show on July 11th!

Blues, Bloodies and Brunch is now Swizzle Sundays. This started June 6th â€¦new time is 4:00-7:00 all summer!

There is never a cover charge at the Narragansett Cafe (with the exception of a few special events).

http://www.narraganse...
item.how_to_find_us: Will have Meetup sign - look for largest table!

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Music and dancing at Narragansett Cafe, Jamestown
